backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining the Ribbit backend with storage, access control, and core data models for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, likes, tags, and activity tracking, including upgrade-safe state restoration.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report listing implemented frontend features, affected files, dependent components, test IDs, and confidence levels for recent UI changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of key frontend files, pages, components, and hooks used for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that mounts the React app, sets metadata, favicon, viewport, and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application bootstrap that configures TanStack Router routes, wraps the app with theme and toast providers, and defines all top-level pages.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Comment item component file intended to render individual ribbits/comments, currently empty or omitted in this snapshot.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Placeholder or omitted component file intended for emoji-based reaction UI, with no implementation shown.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component rendering navigation links, copyright notice, and attribution branding with consistent styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with logo, search, mobile hamburger menu, action buttons, user avatar, and responsive behavior for mobile and desktop.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps pages with header and footer, manages mobile left sidebar drawer state, and closes it on route changes.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Renders the main left navigation sidebar with links (Home, Ponds, Create, Settings) and a recent activity list, highlighting active routes and supporting a mobile drawer mode.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a post (lily) card with metadata, avatar, image handling, counts (views, likes, comments), and like/unlike interactions, integrating multiple data-fetching hooks.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Implements a slide-in mobile drawer wrapper for the LeftSidebar, including a scrim overlay and body scroll locking when open.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: This file is currently empty and contains no implementation.

frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a single ribbit (comment) with nested replies, likes, reply creation, avatars, timestamps, and depth-based indentation.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Renders the right sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and popular recent posts computed from fetched ponds and lilies data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React Query hook to create and manage an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login, logout, identity persistence, and detailed login status state using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating pond, user, and content data via an actor, including listing/searching ponds, joining/leaving ponds, creating ponds, and fetching user profiles, with cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens (CSS variables) for light and dark themes, base styles for body and inputs, and a small utility for hover darkening on light buttons.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Utility function that formats large numbers into compact k/M/B notation with one decimal precision and trimmed trailing zeros.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Client-side user utility managing anonymous usernames, user IDs, and a recoverable "Froggy Phrase" using localStorage, including backup, restore, and simple hashing/obfuscation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, sets up the React Query client, wraps the app with Internet Identity and Query providers, and mounts to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static informational page describing the Ribbit platform, its features, and community guidelines using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Page that lists all ponds with loading states, membership badges, and navigation to pond pages, using query hooks to fetch ponds and joined status.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form-driven page for creating a new Lily post (text, image, or link), handling pond selection, tag suggestions, image uploads, validation, and submission via query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Implements a form page for creating a new pond, handling input validation, image uploads with previews, and submission via the create pond mutation with user feedback via toasts.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: File exists but currently contains no implementation or exported component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main home feed with left/right sidebars, supports searching and sorting lilies by trending or new, and displays loading skeletons or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily post with its image, metadata, likes, views, and ribbits (comments), and allows users to like/unlike and create new ribbits.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed information about a pond including description, moderators, visibility, and creation date, with actions to navigate tabs or leave the pond.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Renders a pondâ€™s feed with banner and profile imagery, lists lilies belonging to the pond, and allows users to join the pond if not already a member.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: File exists but currently contains no implementation or exported component.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies associated with a specific tag, resolves canonical tags, supports multiple sort options, and shows related pond context with sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: React settings page handling username changes with availability/cooldown checks, avatar upload and preview, Froggy Phrase management, joined-ponds listing with leave actions, and admin-only tag tools. It orchestrates many React Query hooks, local state, and shadcn UI components to manage user profile data and mutations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling class-based dark mode, defining content paths, and extending the theme with CSS-variable-driven colors, radii, animations, and container settings. Includes animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata file describing Ribbit, its architecture, and a versioned catalog of existing features. Serves as a structured snapshot of backend/frontend capabilities, roles, and major systems for planning and tracking.
